amendment.description: To authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2006 for military activities of the Department of Defense, for military construction, and for defense activities of the Department of Energy, to prescribe personnel strengths for such fiscal year for the Armed Forces, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 1955 proposed by Senator Warner.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1955.
The defense of germaneness relative to Amendment SA 1955 was raised.
Amendment SA 1955 determined non-germane by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 247.
Amendment SA 1955 ruled out of order by the chair.
